mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usertb (userid, uuid, ppass, pname, email, phone, birth, gender, certno, adate, mdate) VALUES (#{userid}, UUID(), #{ppass}, #{pname}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{certno}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE usertb SET ppass = #{ppass}, pname = #{pname}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, birth = #{birth}, gender = #{gender}, certno = #{certno}, mdate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE userid = #{userid}
